topic.title: Voice and Text Service
topic.body: Someone make it please. It can be one website or people can clone it and then voice and text others freely. I know some services already provid something like this. But this should be private and Israel, I mean the FBI, CIA, etc, shall not have access to it ve design.

1574563424_1EJJc5r6kt7XrSdBCm17zUNCDepe1.body: I want to talk about Israel, etc. And I dont want Israel, I mean the fbi, CIA, etc, by design listening in. With all the current voice and text/chat services, they are either by design or are easily listened in on... by Israel, I mean the FBI, cia, etc.
